persons: Elizabeth II, Queen of Great Britain
subject: Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: This year's edition will be even more festive than usual because it is the queen's Diamond Jubilee year and the world's top-ranked thoroughbreds will be on hand to help celebrate.
snippet: This year's edition will be even more festive than usual because it is the queen's Diamond Jubilee year and the world's top-ranked thoroughbreds will be on hand to help celebrate.
